name: Next in Series
description: Automatically queue the next movie in a series/collection to Continue Watching when a movie is finished.
overview: This plugin detects when you finish watching a movie and automatically adds the next movie in the series or collection to your Continue Watching list. Perfect for movie marathons and series viewing!

versions.changelog:
Initial release
- Automatic detection of finished movies
- Queue next movie in collections
- Configurable watch percentage threshold
- Settings for delays and collection-only mode
